tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NNS toys) (NN R)) (NP (PRP us) (NN advert))) (VP (VBZ makes) (S (NP (PRP me)) (VP (VB want) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB scream))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [makes/VBZ nsubj>[R/NN det>The/DT compound>toys/NNS dep>[advert/NN dep>us/PRP]] ccomp>[want/VB nsubj>me/PRP xcomp>[scream/VB mark>to/TO]] punct>./.]
